projects.title: python-docget
projects.short_desc: A package for the now sunset IDE Atom which adds a side panel to search python documentation. I used the Atom API enpoints to fetch the user's selected word and then used the JavaScript https library to manually scrape the python documentation and transform it into a user readable format.

projects.title: Melds of Majesty
projects.short_desc: An idle game based loosely on the card game gin rummy. Created as part of a UCSB Game Dev Club quarterly project. I used react to create the frontend and then coded the game logic in bare JavaScript.
